name: Isaac Anthony
overview:
Established in August 2005, Isaac Anthony is a completely independent Estate Agent with an unrivalled reputation for delivering results.

Initially specialising in the Manchester and Liverpool city centre rentals market, Isaac Anthony now offers the complete spectrum of Estate Agency with hundreds of apartments, houses and flats available across Greater Manchester and Merseyside.

We use innovative technology and efficient business processes, however the Isaac Anthony team is by far our biggest strength. Passionate about property and customer excellence; we recruit carefully and only employ the best! Our teams of hungry and proactive Sales Negotiators are fully equipped to secure the best offers for your property and in our view, provide a personalised customer service that is hard to beat.

When it comes to advertising, our on-line marketing is second to none. Virtually all serious buyers and renters now research their next home on the internet and Isaac Anthony fully recognises this. That’s why your property will be loaded on our user friendly website www.isaacanthony.co.uk as well as having significant online coverage on the top property search engines and portals. By combining this with dynamic, targeted advertising it means we are never short of potential buyers right from the word go.

The much talked about Isaac Anthony cars, have become a common sight on the streets of Manchester and Liverpool as they chauffeur buyers and tenants around our properties. In fact, you’ve probably even already seen them yourself!

Demand for the Isaac Anthony service has fuelled a phenomenal rate of growth in our relatively short trading history. We are constantly evaluating, changing and adapting to our customers needs. We work tirelessly to develop best practice in every aspect of our service and our company mantra “unusually good at what we do” remains at the forefront of every customer interaction.
